results.description: Dundee United scrap their way to a 2-0 win over their city rivals to increase their lead to six points at the top of the Scottish Championship.
results.shortTitle: United extend lead with derby victory
results.title: Dundee 0-2 Dundee United: Robbie Neilson's side win battle at Dens Park

results.description: Head coach Robbie Neilson says derby games will be vital in the Championship title race as Dundee United prepare for Friday's visit to Dens Park.
results.shortTitle: Derbies key to title - Dundee Utd boss
results.title: Dundee v Dundee United: Robbie Neilson says derbies will be key in title race

results.description: Test your knowledge on the history of Dundee derbies by trying our quiz
results.shortTitle: Dundee derby quiz
results.title: Dundee v Dundee Utd: Test your knowledge in our quiz

results.description: Dundee United maintain their three-point lead in the Scottish Championship with an impressive three-goal victory against Inverness Caledonian Thistle.
results.shortTitle: Dundee Utd win at Inverness to stay top
results.title: Inverness CT 0-3 Dundee Utd: Robbie Neilson's side stay top of Championship

results.description: Inverness CT manager John Robertson thinks the Scottish Championship title will not be decided by budgets despite the Dundee clubs' financial dominance.
results.shortTitle: Title 'not a battle of wage bills'
results.title: Inverness CT: Money will not decide Scottish Championship, says John Robertson

thumbnail.altText: Inverness Caledonian Thistle manager John Robertson

results.description: Dundee United owner Mark Ogren intends to continue backing the club even if they fail to reach the Scottish Premiership in the next few seasons.
results.shortTitle: Dundee Utd owner intends long stay
results.title: Dundee United: Owner Mark Ogren expects to stay at club

results.description: Dundee United maintain their three-point lead at the top of the Scottish Championship after Lawrence Shankland's 17th goal of the season earned victory over Partick Thistle.
results.shortTitle: Shankland goal earns Utd win over Thistle
results.title: Dundee Utd 1-0 Partick Thistle: Lawrence Shankland goal earns leaders win

results.description: Championship leaders Dundee United record a loss of £3.7m in the last year, with salaries at 133% of turnover.
results.shortTitle: Dundee United post £3.7m yearly loss
results.title: Dundee United record £3.7m loss & large turnover deficit

thumbnail.altText: Dundee United have invested heavily in a bid to return to the top flight

results.description: Dundee United capitalise on Ayr's Friday night defeat by beating Dunfermline to move three points clear at the top of the Championship.
results.shortTitle: Dundee United move three points clear at top
results.title: Dundee United 2-0 Dunfermline Athletic: Robbie Neilson's side three points clear at top

thumbnail.altText: Dundee United's Nicky Clark celebrates the second goal

results.description: Dundee United stay top of the Scottish Championship despite a humiliating 4-0 defeat by Queen of the South.
results.shortTitle: Dobbie nets twice as QoS beat leaders
results.title: Queen of South 4-0 Dundee Utd: Stephen Dobbie nets twice to beat leaders

results.description: Head coach Robbie Neilson will be at Dundee United next season even if the club fail to win promotion, says sporting director Tony Asghar.
results.shortTitle: Neilson safe even if United stay down
results.title: Robbie Neilson: Dundee Utd will keep boss even if they fail in Premiership bid

results.description: Alloa Athletic upset the odds with a super goal from Kevin O'Hara proving enough to get the better of table-topping Dundee United in the Scottish Championship. (UK only)
results.shortTitle: Watch: Alloa down Dundee Utd with O'Hara goal
results.title: Watch: Dundee United lose to Alloa Athletic thanks to Kevin O'Hara goal

thumbnail.altText: Alloa down United with O'Hara goal

results.description: Alloa Athletic produce a tremendous performance as Kevin O'Hara's goal proves enough to shock table-toppers Dundee United.
results.shortTitle: Alloa shock Championship leaders United
results.title: Alloa Athletic 1-0 Dundee United: Leaders shocked by hosts

thumbnail.altText: Alloa's Kevin O'Hara celebrates his goal

results.description: How did Lawrence Shankland end up staying in Scotland's second tier with Dundee United? And could he be the solution for the national team?
results.shortTitle: Is Shankland the solution for Scotland?
results.title: Lawrence Shankland: Is Dundee Utd striker solution for Scotland?

results.description: Dundee United striker Lawrence Shankland shows the eye for goal that has led to the 24-year-old being called up to the Scotland squad for the first time. (UK only)
results.shortTitle: Watch: One of Shankland's 15 goals this season
results.title: Lawrence Shankland: One of Dundee Utd striker's 15 goals this season

results.description: Championship leaders Dundee United are in irresistible form with Lawrence Shankland scoring a hat-trick as they thump Morton.
results.shortTitle: Shankland hat-trick as Dundee United hammer Morton
results.title: Dundee United 6-0 Greenock Morton

thumbnail.altText: Lawrence Shankland scored a hat-trick for Dundee United

results.description: Dundee United remain top of the Scottish Championship on goal difference after Lawrence Shankland's late double earns them a dramatic win over Arbroath.
results.shortTitle: Late Shankland brace keeps United top
results.title: Dundee United 2-1 Arbroath: Late Lawrence Shankland double keeps hosts top

results.description: Lawrence Shankland endures a miserable return to his former club as Ayr United end Dundee United's winning start and join them at the top of the Scottish Championship.
results.shortTitle: Ayr beat United to move joint top
results.title: Ayr United 2-0 Dundee United: Hosts move joint top

results.description: All the arrivals and departures during summer 2019 in the Scottish Championship.
results.shortTitle: Scottish Championship summer ins and outs
results.title: Scottish Championship ins and outs - Summer 2019

results.description: Dundee join city rivals Dundee United in being knocked out of the Challenge Cup third round after a 2-1 home defeat by League Two side Elgin City.
results.shortTitle: Both Dundee clubs out of Challenge Cup
results.title: Scottish Challenge Cup: Dundee lose to Elgin, Dundee United defeated on penalties by Arbroath

thumbnail.altText: Elgin's Shane Sutherland celebrates against Dundee
